message.content: examine my app , theres an error thats preventing it from being clickable on the loging page and other pages. inspect my deisgn and search online for lickley solutions. use playwright mcp to see what you are doing

content.text: I'll help you examine your app for clickability issues on the login page and other pages. Let me start by exploring your codebase structure and then use Playwright to inspect the actual behavior.

todos.content: Examine app structure and identify login page files
todos.activeForm: Examining app structure and identifying login page files

todos.content: Use Playwright to inspect clickability issues on login page
todos.activeForm: Using Playwright to inspect clickability issues on login page

todos.content: Search online for common clickability solutions
todos.activeForm: Searching online for common clickability solutions

todos.content: Analyze design and CSS for potential blocking elements
todos.activeForm: Analyzing design and CSS for potential blocking elements

todos.content: Provide specific fixes for identified issues
todos.activeForm: Providing specific fixes for identified issues

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

content.content:
1→{
     2→  "name": "collision-os",
     3→  "version": "1.0.0",
     4→  "description": "Complete Auto Body Shop Management Desktop Application",
     5→  "main": "electron/main.js",
     6→  "homepage": "./",
     7→  "proxy": "http://localhost:3005",
     8→  "scripts": {
     9→    "start": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\"",
    10→    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron .\"",
    11→    "dev:debug": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron . --inspect\"",
    12→    "dev:ui": "npm run client",
    13→    "dev:server": "npm run server",
    14→    "server": "nodemon server/index.js",
    15→    "client": "set BROWSER=none&& set PORT=3003&& set FAST_REFRESH=false&& react-scripts start",
    16→    "build": "react-scripts build",
    17→    "build:analyze": "npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js",
    18→    "electron": "electron .",
    19→    "electron-dev": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron .\"",
    20→    "electron-pack": "npm run build && electron-builder",
    21→    "test": "react-scripts test",
    22→    "test:watch": "react-scripts test --watch",
    23→    "test:coverage": "react-scripts test --coverage --watchAll=false",
    24→    "eject": "react-scripts eject",
    25→    "db:migrate": "node server/database/migrate.js",
    26→    "db:seed": "node server/database/seed.js",
    27→    "test:e2e": "node run-tests.js all",
    28→    "test:smoke": "node run-tests.js smoke",
    29→    "test:auth": "node run-tests.js auth",
    30→    "test:dashboard": "node run-tests.js dashboard",
    31→    "test:production": "node run-tests.js production",
    32→    "test:parts": "node run-tests.js parts",
    33→    "test:system": "node run-tests.js system",
    34→    "test:playwright": "npx playwright test",
    35→    "test:ui": "npx playwright test --ui",
    36→    "test:headed": "npx playwright test --headed",
    37→    "test:debug": "npx playwright test --debug",
    38→    "lint": "eslint src/**/*.{js,jsx}",
    39→    "lint:fix": "eslint src/**/*.{js,jsx} --fix",
    40→    "format": "prettier --write src/**/*.{js,jsx,css,md}",
    41→    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit"
    42→  },
    43→  "dependencies": {
    44→    "@emotion/react": "^11.14.0",
    45→    "@emotion/styled": "^11.14.1",
    46→    "@mui/icons-material": "^7.3.1",
    47→    "@mui/material": "^7.3.1",
    48→    "axios": "^1.6.2",
    49→    "bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    50→    "chart.js": "^4.5.0",
    51→    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    52→    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    53→    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    54→    "electron-is-dev": "^2.0.0",
    55→    "electron-store": "^8.1.0",
    56→    "express": "^4.18.2",
    57→    "framer-motion": "^10.16.16",
    58→    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    59→    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    60→    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    61→    "react": "^18.2.0",
    62→    "react-beautiful-dnd": "^13.1.1",
    63→    "react-chartjs-2": "^5.3.0",
    64→    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    65→    "react-hot-toast": "^2.4.1",
    66→    "react-query": "^3.39.3",
    67→    "react-router-dom": "^6.20.1",
    68→    "react-scripts": "5.0.1",
    69→    "sequelize": "^6.35.1",
    70→    "socket.io": "^4.7.4",
    71→    "socket.io-client": "^4.7.4",
    72→    "sqlite3": "^5.1.6",
    73→    "zustand": "^4.4.7"
    74→  },
    75→  "devDependencies": {
    76→    "@playwright/test": "^1.55.0",
    77→    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^5.17.0",
    78→    "@testing-library/react": "^13.4.0",
    79→    "@testing-library/user-event": "^13.5.0",
    80→    "concurrently": "^8.2.2",
    81→    "cross-env": "^7.0.3",
    82→    "electron": "^27.1.3",
    83→    "electron-builder": "^24.6.4",
    84→    "nodemon": "^3.0.2",
    85→    "playwright": "^1.55.0",
    86→    "wait-on": "^7.2.0",
    87→    "web-vitals": "^2.1.4"
    88→  },
    89→  "browserslist": {
    90→    "production": [
    91→      ">0.2%",
    92→      "not dead",
    93→      "not op_mini all"
    94→    ],
    95→    "development": [
    96→      "last 1 chrome version",
    97→      "last 1 firefox version",
    98→      "last 1 safari version"
    99→    ]
   100→  },
   101→  "build": {
   102→    "appId": "com.collisionos.app",
   103→    "productName": "CollisionOS",
   104→    "directories": {
   105→      "output": "dist"
   106→    },
   107→    "files": [
   108→      "build/**/*",
   109→      "electron/**/*",
   110→      "server/**/*",
   111→      "node_modules/**/*"
   112→    ],
   113→    "win": {
   114→      "target": "nsis",
   115→      "icon": "assets/icon.ico"
   116→    },
   117→    "mac": {
   118→      "target": "dmg",
   119→      "icon": "assets/icon.icns"
   120→    },
   121→    "linux": {
   122→      "target": "AppImage",
   123→      "icon": "assets/icon.png"
   124→    }
   125→  }
   126→}
   127→

file.content:
{
  "name": "collision-os",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Complete Auto Body Shop Management Desktop Application",
  "main": "electron/main.js",
  "homepage": "./",
  "proxy": "http://localhost:3005",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\"",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron .\"",
    "dev:debug": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron . --inspect\"",
    "dev:ui": "npm run client",
    "dev:server": "npm run server",
    "server": "nodemon server/index.js",
    "client": "set BROWSER=none&& set PORT=3003&& set FAST_REFRESH=false&& react-scripts start",
    "build": "react-scripts build",
    "build:analyze": "npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js",
    "electron": "electron .",
    "electron-dev": "concurrently \"npm run server\" \"npm run client\" \"wait-on http://localhost:3003 && electron .\"",
    "electron-pack": "npm run build && electron-builder",
    "test": "react-scripts test",
    "test:watch": "react-scripts test --watch",
    "test:coverage": "react-scripts test --coverage --watchAll=false",
    "eject": "react-scripts eject",
    "db:migrate": "node server/database/migrate.js",
    "db:seed": "node server/database/seed.js",
    "test:e2e": "node run-tests.js all",
    "test:smoke": "node run-tests.js smoke",
    "test:auth": "node run-tests.js auth",
    "test:dashboard": "node run-tests.js dashboard",
    "test:production": "node run-tests.js production",
    "test:parts": "node run-tests.js parts",
    "test:system": "node run-tests.js system",
    "test:playwright": "npx playwright test",
    "test:ui": "npx playwright test --ui",
    "test:headed": "npx playwright test --headed",
    "test:debug": "npx playwright test --debug",
    "lint": "eslint src/**/*.{js,jsx}",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src/**/*.{js,jsx} --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write src/**/*.{js,jsx,css,md}",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@emotion/react": "^11.14.0",
    "@emotion/styled": "^11.14.1",
    "@mui/icons-material": "^7.3.1",
    "@mui/material": "^7.3.1",
    "axios": "^1.6.2",
    "bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "chart.js": "^4.5.0",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    "electron-is-dev": "^2.0.0",
    "electron-store": "^8.1.0",
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "framer-motion": "^10.16.16",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-beautiful-dnd": "^13.1.1",
    "react-chartjs-2": "^5.3.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-hot-toast": "^2.4.1",
    "react-query": "^3.39.3",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.20.1",
    "react-scripts": "5.0.1",
    "sequelize": "^6.35.1",
    "socket.io": "^4.7.4",
    "socket.io-client": "^4.7.4",
    "sqlite3": "^5.1.6",
    "zustand": "^4.4.7"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@playwright/test": "^1.55.0",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^5.17.0",
    "@testing-library/react": "^13.4.0",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^13.5.0",
    "concurrently": "^8.2.2",
    "cross-env": "^7.0.3",
    "electron": "^27.1.3",
    "electron-builder": "^24.6.4",
    "nodemon": "^3.0.2",
    "playwright": "^1.55.0",
    "wait-on": "^7.2.0",
    "web-vitals": "^2.1.4"
  },
  "browserslist": {
    "production": [
      ">0.2%",
      "not dead",
      "not op_mini all"
    ],
    "development": [
      "last 1 chrome version",
      "last 1 firefox version",
      "last 1 safari version"
    ]
  },
  "build": {
    "appId": "com.collisionos.app",
    "productName": "CollisionOS",
    "directories": {
      "output": "dist"
    },
    "files": [
      "build/**/*",
      "electron/**/*",
      "server/**/*",
      "node_modules/**/*"
    ],
    "win": {
      "target": "nsis",
      "icon": "assets/icon.ico"
    },
    "mac": {
      "target": "dmg",
      "icon": "assets/icon.icns"
    },
    "linux": {
      "target": "AppImage",
      "icon": "assets/icon.png"
    }
  }
}

content.text: I see the issue - there are still processes running. Let me use a different approach to kill the ports and start fresh:

content.content: {"success":true,"message":"Successfully killed shell: bash_2 (set PORT=3002 && set SERVER_PORT=3006 && npm start)","shell_id":"bash_2"}

toolUseResult.message: Successfully killed shell: bash_2 (set PORT=3002 && set SERVER_PORT=3006 && npm start)

input.command: powershell -command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Node processes killed'"
